author: craigmcc
msg: Fix a security vulnerability that would display the contents of sensitive
files when a URL like this was used:
This vulnerability appears on Linux (and any other OS that ignores "//" in
the middle of a pathname), but not on Windows.

author: craigmcc
msg: Make JDBCRealm not final so that it can be conveniently subclassed.

author: craigmcc
msg: Fix a security vulnerability -- the "ShowSource" custom tag in conjunction
with the "/examples/jsp/source.jsp page could be used to expose the contents
of sensitive information in the WEB-INF or META-INF directories.
